title: Protection against weather
fullText:
Socket-outlets installed in locations exposed to weather shall have a minimum degree of protection of IPX3.
NOTE: Socket-outlets installed in locations exposed to weather include those installed—
(a) outdoors;
(b) in carports;
(c) on verandahs; and
(d) in similar locations.
Exception: Socket-outlets need not have a minimum degree of protection of IPX3 where they are—
(a) specifically designed for the conditions of use; or
(b) mounted in an enclosure that provides adequate protection against weather.
